name: monsterLabShooter
description:
This game was inspired by alien shooter games, but this game intended for players to have fun with the game itself. don't focus on difficulty The plot was the result of a researcher's mistake that allowed the spiders. slipped into a test tube thus resulting in mutation and spread to living things

There are 9 levels in the game, the player is given a mission to plant a c4 bomb, each zone will be blocked by monsters. Players can use firearm shooting skills, electric swords, exhaustion and dodge to complete missions.
